All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ImageDisplayManager
This method uses Image object list and InputStream to load images from source path, store them and extract random image from the stored list
Main
This is the main method, which is the Quiz game
QuizModal
This class is a QuizModal class which contain two data in 3*3 array (questions and answer) After a constructor is created the questions and answer array and loaded then random questions are generated based on difficulty level, the answer are checked using the difficulty level index and a parameter which would be a user answer the score and chance are increment or decremented accordingly.
